channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI-Driven Video Production: Architecting The Next Generation Of Tools
item.description: How can we preserve the power of code-based approaches while making them accessible to creators across all skill levels?

item.title: The Economics Of Generative AI: Evading Three Financial Pitfalls In 2025
item.description: Together, CTOs and CFOs can avoid these three financial pitfalls while championing a top-down AI approach that prioritizes ROI above all.

item.title: This Is How To Photograph Saturday’s Solar Eclipse With A Phone
item.description: The March 29, 2025, partial solar eclipse will create a crescent sunrise over North America. Here are the best ways to capture it on a smartphone.

item.title: 3 Ways AI Is Reshaping Business And How You Should Prepare For The Future
item.description: The question isn’t whether AI will change the business world—it already has. The real question is: Are you ready for what’s coming next?

item.title: One Of The Best Action Movies Of 2024 With A 97% Audience Score Is Streaming Now On Prime Video
item.description: One of the best and best-reviewed movies of 2024 is now free with your Amazon Prime membership.

item.title: The name doesn’t matter (that much)

item.title: The NSE confusions

item.title: Project ownership (equity and equity)

item.description: One way to understand creative work is to think about the time and effort required to do something the first time versus doing it again. A novel might...

item.title: Picky or particular?
